raw_text:
Today
Voice call
No answer 10:45 AM
Hello Sagar ji ,
Happy Diwali belated and good morning. A new buyer messaged me today morning regarding if he can purchase the land.
He seems quite interested and wants to know your availability for tomorrow evening (while you travel back to home from your hospital), he wants to have a meeting at his office.
His office is near Irrum manzil metro station. Kindly acknowledge
10:48 AM
No
3:37 PM

messages.text: Hello Sagar ji , Happy Diwali belated and good morning. A new buyer messaged me today morning regarding if he can purchase the land. He seems quite interested and wants to know your availability for tomorrow evening (while you travel back to home from your hospital), he wants to have a meeting at his office. His office is near Irrum manzil metro station. Kindly acknowledge
